```{r 1st chunk}
library(tidyverse)
library(macleish)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r 2nd chunk}
my_points <- tribble(
  ~point, ~lat, ~lon,
  "Group Campsite", 42.450976, -72.678154,
  "Remote Campsite", 42.458549, -72.679581,
  "Parking", 42.448013, -72.680663)
```

```{r 3rd chunk}
require(leaflet)
base_plot <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, data = my_points,
             popup = ~point)
base_plot
